Package com.stanchionpayments

Class Madlibs

java.lang.Object
com.stanchionpayments.Madlibs
public class Madlibs extends Object
Class for java Madlibs game Madlibs is a simple children’s game one can play on a text-based console where the user is asked for several words based on their grammatical type – e.g. verbs, adjectives, nouns, etc – and then these words are inserted into a preexisting piece of text to make a silly story.
